ruleBookInfo.name: data_list.qishu

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function generateRandomString(length) {
    var str = '';
    var chars = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789';
    for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
      str += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length));
    }
    return str;
  }
var ua = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:109.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/115.0";
var keys = "apilifves5201314";
var nostr = generateRandomString(32);
var times = Math.round(new Date().getTime()/1000).toString();
var str1 = "timestamp=" + times + "&nonce=" + nostr;
var secret = java.md5Encode(str1 + keys);
var headers = {
    "User-Agent": ua,
    "Secret-Date": str1,
    "Secreted": secret
}
var option = {   
    "headers": headers,    
};

function gettext(a){
    var url = baseUrl;
    var text = java.ajax(url+","+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify(a)));
    return text
}
result =  gettext(option)
//java.log(result);

</js>

<js>
function generateRandomString(length) {
    var str = '';
    var chars = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789';
    for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
      str += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length));
    }
    return str;
  }
var ua = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:109.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/115.0";
var keys = "apilifves5201314";
var nostr = generateRandomString(32);
var times = Math.round(new Date().getTime()/1000).toString();
var str1 = "timestamp=" + times + "&nonce=" + nostr;
var secret = java.md5Encode(str1 + keys);
var headers = {
    "User-Agent": ua,
    "Secret-Date": str1,
    "Secreted": secret
}
var option = {   
    "headers": headers, 
};
function gettext(a){
    var url = baseUrl;
    var text = java.ajax(url+","+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify(a)));
    return text
}
result =  gettext(option)
</js>
